title: Hongjun Kim
text:
Welcome!

Hello! My name is Hongjun Kim, I am a third-year student at UCSB studying Statistics and Data Science. Extremely Intrigued by Data Science, Machine Learning (AI), and Data Architect.

Education

Bachelor’s degree in Statistics and Data Science at UC Santa Barbara.
Expected to graduate in June 2025.
Temporary Change

title: About
text:
Let me introduce myself!

My name is Hongjun Kim, I am a first-generation immigrant from South Korea. I have lived and studied in the United States since 2010. I graduated from Granada Hills Charter High School back in 2020. Attended Los Angeles Pierce College to get an Associate’s degree then transferred to UC Santa Barbara. I am Native in Korean, English, and Limited Working Proficiency in Spanish.

Educational Background

I am experienced in multiple languages of coding: C++, R, Python, SQL, and Java.

title: Portfolio
text:
Here are a few examples of my work from relevant course works.
Link to final paper in Psychology 074, as a first-generation immigrant I decided to collect and evaluate different perspectives and support from a diverse group of randomly selected individuals.
